entry.title: Libre/Open blockchain / cryptographic ASICs
entry.summary: In a recent communication, there was a request made regarding the redirection of certain emails. Specifically, it was asked that messages which are being forwarded from a moderated list, notably off-topic messages from the Bitcoin development community found at [Bitcoin Dev Moderation](https://lists.ozlabs.org/pipermail/bitcoin-dev-moderation/), be instead sent to a different mailing list. The new destination for these emails is libre-soc-dev@lists.libre-soc.org. This request underscores the importance of ensuring relevant communications are directed to the most appropriate channels, highlighting an effort to streamline information flow and maintain focus within specific development discussions.
